body.name: O2 Cool Fan 8 inch Battery or Electric Operated Indoor/Outdoor Portable Fan with AC Adapter, Tilts 90 Degrees
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by thePruneDanish.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Optimized with your comfort in mind, the user friendly unit features a travel sized, foldable design, with state of the art cooling technology, and a robust tilting capability of up to 90°, allowing you to pan the unit for the perfect blast of cool breeze.

TRAVEL FRIENDLY | PORTABLE: The best portable fan for your daily routines and travel ventures. Provides maximum cooling on hot summer days in the park. Perfect for life on the go, with an ultra-lightweight frame measuring L11” x H10” x W3.3” and includes an AC adapter for the convenience of mobile charging.
DUAL POWER SOURCE: The compact 2 speed fan conveniently supports dual power source modes (AC/DC). Includes an AC adapter and is compatible with 8-D batteries (Not included).

ULTRA QUIET COOLING: Designed with noise free technology the travel sized companion is perfect for your daily routines, office, gym, park, camping and more. Enjoy your music or talking on the phone without the drowning noise of traditional fans.

HIGH PRFORMANCE | COLLAPSIBLE: The unit offers 43 hours of continuous airflow at a high speed, and an extended 53 hours of continuous support a low speed selection. The travel friendly fan is foldable making it super easy to store and an awesome road companion.
body.description: Our unit keeps you exceptionally cool on hot and humid days. Perfect for life in the great outdoors, offering maximum coolingsatisfaction when you need it the most. An ultra-portable design makes it an excellent selection for the beach, camping, gymor in the comfort of your own home. Provides full functionality as a floor unit, or an ultra-quiet desktop fan for home and office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great battery operated Fan
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent battery operated fan which is perfect for outages. it has all that's needed to providedecent fan wind. A good feature is it's fold-able for storage in it's box when not needed. So glad we found this small but necessary item due to hurricanes and outages in our State. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moves air very well
reviews.reviewText: This fan is the perfect size for personal space. I put it on the bedside table at night and it cools very good and is quiet. Bought it because I live in Phoenix, Arizona and power can go out during summer storms and I must have a fan when its 115 degrees!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little fan
reviews.reviewText: I had a 10” O2cool fan for years and it finally died because I used it 12 hours every day. I should have gotten the same size but this is fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little fan for usage inside and outside
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased various O2 fans over the years and have found them to be very useful during power outages and for outside events during hot weather. If you need fan for a small space this fan will provide a strong air flow that you can feel at least three feet away. The price is great if you are on budget and you need several.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Batteries 6 Not 8. Not 12VDC comparable.
reviews.reviewText: The fan works and is quiet as advertised but the product information states“is compatible with 8-D batteries”Not True! It only takes 6D batteries = 9VDC.If it took 8 batteries (8 D batteries = 12VDC) it would make for an easy 12 volt cigarette lighter conversation to be used on an RV or boat.If these companies could get their descriptions correct there would be a lot less returns.Also delivery took 2 extra days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light Weight and Versatile
reviews.reviewText: This fan moves a lot of air for its size. I bought it to go with my hurricane supplies, but I like it so much that it’s never made it to the storage closet. It is light weight, has an adjustable air flow and switches easily from power cord to battery. A an excellent addition to our heat mitigation gadgets. It’s Florida; we need all the help we can get!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do NOT Count On This Fan!
reviews.reviewText: I would give it zero stars if I could. Purchased in anticipation of upcoming Hurricane Dorian. Arrived when expected, but it is useless. Would not work with brand new batteries, would not work with the electric plug. I was really counting on this to use as part of our hurricane emergency kit, and of course at this point there are no battery operated fans in any of the stores in my area. As soon as storm passes and roads are safe I will be returning this. Do NOT order if you are really counting on a fan that will work right out of the box.UPDATE: I contacted the company who makes this fan and this is the reply I got from them:"Our 8" fans were discontinued about 3 to 4 years ago; therefore, Amazon had no other recourse but to honor the return. I am sure this was a mistake on Amazon's part, but we only carry 5" and 10" models of our fans."That was all they had to say about this product. Amazon gave me a shipping return label (THANKS)--I do not recommend ordering ANYTHING from the company who manufactured the fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple & Awesome Fan
Sturdy product but not much fan action
reviews.reviewText: Overall a good sturdy product, but doesnt move much air.
